meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

meanings.meaning: You can't take it with you.

vlive.korean: [미니 게임엔 관심 없음] 내가 볼 때는 사이드를 뽑아버리면... [Not interested in the mini game] If you move the ones on the side... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
vlive.english: [Not interested in the mini game] If you move the ones on the side...

vlive.korean: 물 따로 버리면 안 돼요? May I drain the water separately? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 쩨-하🤗
vlive.english: May I drain the water separately?

vlive.korean: [아 그렇구나] 그냥 지나가버리면... [I see] If they just pass by you... 듣기 View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP08 #너와나의연결고리 #버스킹권위자 #아메리카노
vlive.english: [I see] If they just pass by you...

vlive.korean: 거기에서 긴장까지 해버리면 진짜... but if you're also nervous there... 듣기 View video VICTON : 숩이 등장..! 앨리스 섭섭했어요?!😔
vlive.english: but if you're also nervous there...

vlive.korean: 종량제 봉투에 담아서 버리면 돼요? May I take out them in a standard garbage bag? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 쩨-하🤗
vlive.english: May I take out them in a standard garbage bag?

examples.korean: You can throw away any excess. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 지나치게 많은 것은 얼마가 됐든 버리면 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can throw away any excess. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You can’t just turn down offers of work like that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 일자리 제의를 그렇게 그냥 거절해 버리면 안 돼. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You can’t just turn down offers of work like that. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If you leave me, I'm going to kms. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 나를 버리면 나 죽어버릴 거야. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: If you leave me, I'm going to kms. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness. (Nicole Kidman) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 미래를 좌지우지하겠다는 욕망을 버리면 더 행복해질 수 있다. (니콜 키드먼, 행복명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness. (Nicole Kidman) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He with whom neither slander that gradually soaks into the mind, nor statements that startle like a wound in the flesh, are successful may be called intelligent indeed. (Confucius) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 마음에 물처럼 스며드는 은근한 참언이나, 몸에 느껴질 듯 절박한 하소연이라도 버려버리면 진정 현명한 사람이라고 할 수 있느니라. (浸潤之譖 膚受之愬 不行焉 可謂明也已矣 / 침윤지참 부수지소 불행언 가위명야이의) (공자, 용서명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: He with whom neither slander that gradually soaks into the mind, nor statements that startle like a wound in the flesh, are successful may be called intelligent indeed. (Confucius) Add to Wordbook
